channel.title: [REP++] How To Add 525 Gameframe To 317? [REP++]
channel.description:
Hi all,
This is hopefully a simple question. After numerous attempts of using both the search bar, and google, I've failed to find out how to add the 525 Gameframe to a 317 Client.
Unfortunately, I do not have the 525 Gameframe files.
If anybody were to give me the 525 Gameframe files, and explain to me how I can add them to my client, I will give you Rep++. I also don't mind if you forwarded me onto a tutorial on how to do so.
Thanks in advance, hopefully this made sense! - Jackson.

item.title: [REP++] How To Add 525 Gameframe To 317? [REP++]
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
